Guard Pinaps:
The Enchanted Vally may look nearby on the map but is actually quite far. It is accessable from the north and south. Hunters camping to the south eventually turned their campsites into a village...
It is said that Fairies hide there...Certainly you've heard the legends of Fairies? Tiny Elf-link creatures with small wings... Anyway, in the past they were hunted by Humans, and today they hunt the Men living in the valley. This is one of the reasons why the valley is not a safe place for humans...
If you would like to learn more about Faries, ask at Hunters' Village. They know all about them!
